alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:01PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ada, southwestern Boise, west central Elmore, northwestern Owyhee and southeastern Gem Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 901 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Emmett to Boise to near Murphy. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boise, Garden City, Hidden Springs and Blacks Creek Reservoir around 910 PM MDT. Sweet, Montour, Lucky Peak Dam and Bogus Basin Ski Area around 920 PM MDT. Horseshoe Bend, Gardena, Lucky Peak Reservoir and Aldape Summit around 930 PM MDT. Arrowrock Dam and Big Foot Butte around 940 PM MDT. Harris Creek Summit around 950 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
